title: (BONUS EP) Criminal Curses
description:
This month, the gals test the gods when it comes to all things incantations and execrations. Topics include the Boston Marathon heard round the world, the judgment of impure souls, and the effects of "the Communism scare." Pop open a bottle of Winc's Invoke Sauvignon Blanc, invest in your local newspaper, and tune into Criminal Curses.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit www.wineandcrimepodcast.com/support
